ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1.dao

Class LineOfTextFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1.dao.LineOfTextFileReader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProjectReader, ResourceReader

    public class LineOfTextFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the methods that allow the caller to open an existing file and read one line of input (to end-of-line) from the file.
